messages.title: Leavers – Don't Waste Your Votes!
messages.content: More than 90% of Labour MPs are Remainers. Yet more than 60% of Labour constituencies voted to leave. In an area like the North East, 85% of Labour seats voted Leave. Some of Britain's staunchest Leave seats are represented by arch Labour Remainers.

messages.title:
NO TO A SECOND REFERENDUM
YES TO A REAL BREXIT
messages.content: This is a Brexit General Election. Our priority is to stop a Corbyn-led Remainer alliance sneaking into power and using a rigged second referendum to overturn the votes of 17.4m Leavers. That’s why we are fighting to win Labour and Remainer-held seats, such as yours.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: We must control our laws, borders, money and defence.
Let’s make Parliament serve the People.
Keep investing, better management, less waste.
Spend £200bn on transport and jobs in the Regions.
We need a fair, firm points-based system.

mentions.otherPartyLeaderCandidate: No Leaver should vote Labour. Jeremy Corbyn promised to respect the Brexit vote.
mentions.tacticalSituation: At the May European Election, the Brexit Party won more votes than Labour and the Tories put together.

issues.brexitEurope: We don’t like Boris Johnson’s EU Treaty and we don’t trust the Conservatives to deliver Brexit.
issues.economy: Let’s make Parliament serve the People.
issues.government: We need big democratic reforms to make Parliament serve the People.
issues.health: Supporting the NHS – keep investing, better management, less waste.
issues.immigration: Controlled immigration – we need a fair, firm points-based system.
issues.labourEmployment: Spend £200bn on transport and jobs in the Regions.

community.content: The only way we can hold Boris to his word is by electing Brexit Party MPs.

Nigel Farage MEP, Leader of The Brexit Party
